headline: Intuit Unveils Revolutionary System of Intelligence to Help Businesses Grow in the AI Era
summary: LAS VEGAS, October 28, 2025--Intuit Inc. (Nasdaq: INTU), the global financial technology platform that makes Intuit TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks, and Mailchimp, announced today major innovation to its all-in-one platform, including the introduction of Intuit Intelligence, a revolutionary system of intelligence that provides businesses and accounting firms with everything they need to compete and grow in the AI era. headline: Intuit Launches Intuit Accountant Suite: an AI-native Platform that Drives Efficiency and Growth for Accounting Firms
summary: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., October 28, 2025--Intuit Inc. (Nasdaq: INTU), the global financial technology platform that makes Intuit TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks, and Mailchimp, today announced the launch of Intuit Accountant Suite, a new AI-native platform that provides accounting firms with everything they need to scale and manage their clients, firms, and teams, all in one place.

content.title: Intuit Launches Intuit Accountant Suite: an AI-native Platform that Drives Efficiency and Growth for Accounting Firms
content.summary: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., October 28, 2025--Intuit Inc. (Nasdaq: INTU), the global financial technology platform that makes Intuit TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks, and Mailchimp, today announced the launch of Intuit Accountant Suite, a new AI-native platform that provides accounting firms with everything they need to scale and manage their clients, firms, and teams, all in one place.
